name: Emerge (Aljon Viray)
description:
Find the bar owner's secret recipe of alcohol by solving puzzles before the coppers arrive in this digital escape room set in a film-noir styled speakeasy.

Created as a quarter long non-curriculum project by:  Team Lead, Programmer, Designer - Shaun Prince

Credits:

  • Team Lead / Programmer / Designer --- Shaun Prince
  • Producer --- Aliyah Clayton
  • Gameplay Programmer --- Aljon Vray
  • UI Programmer --- Gavin Dent
  • Game Designer / Writer --- Yi Luo
  • Audio Engineer --- Jack Bueermann

Controls:

  • WASD --- Movement
  • E --- Pickup and drop objects
  • Left Mouse Button --- Throw Dart, if picked up
